column5: Now the darkness only stays the night-time In the morning it will fade away Daylight is good at arriving at the right time It's not always going to be this grey  -George Harrison, February 25, 1943 - November 29, 2001
I was a huge Harrison fan  man time has flown by
Just another reminder that we are all getting old.

yes i heard that on sirius satelite radio this morn !!! george was always my fav of the fab four,he wrote some of their biggest hits too,and he did awesome on his own...wow 10years,and i still remember going online to his fan page and signing his book of condolence,and wrote a letter and even got a reply about 6 months later from someone in his fanclub !!! RIP GEORGE HARRISON....WHAT IS LIFE...
RIP George theres been alot of weeping guitars since you left us
If you like George's music, and haven't seen the concert done in his honor in 2002, go out and get it tonight. Its an absolutely spectacular concert!
